name: Nest Defense
description:
The humans are coming for the forest's magical eggs! Use the power of animals to defend your nest and cage the humans!

Objective:

Redirect the humans into the cages so that they do not steal the eggs. Survive all of the human's attacks to win.

Controls:

  • Hold right-click to rotate camera
  • Drag & Drop left click to place animals
  • X to select Bird, C to select Deer, V to select Rabbit
  • Escape to cancel placement

Credits:

  • Arnaud OLBE: Game Design, 3D Art and Texturing
  • Benjamin PEYRILLE: Game Design and Programming
  • Raphaël BUQUET: Programming
  • Quentin LAS: Sound design
  • The Vulture: Music
